data.title: Film Music Reporter
data.meta_description: Universal Records has released a soundtrack album for the crime drama The Gambler. The album features the songs from the film by artists including Dinah Washing
data.text:
Universal Records has released a soundtrack album for the crime drama The Gambler. The album features the songs from the film by artists including Dinah Washington, M83, Pulp, Billy Bragg, Ayo, Ray LaMontagne, St. Paul & The Broken Bones, Alan Price & more. The soundtrack is now available to download on Amazon, where you can also listen to audio clips. The Gambler is directed by Rupert Wyatt and stars Mark Wahlberg, John Goodman, Brie Larson, Michael Kenneth Williams and Jessica Lange. The movie scored by Jon Brion & Theo Green follows a college professor who gets caught up in the dangerous world of high-stakes underground gambling. The drama will premiere this Friday, December 19 by Paramount Pictures. To learn more about the film, visit the official movie website.
